TEXT.TITLE: OSHMAN'S SPORTING GOODS INC <OSHM> 4TH QTR NET
TEXT.BODY:
Qtr ended Jan 31 Shr 92 cts vs 1.28 dlrs Net 5,415,000 vs 7,730,000 Revs 114.2 mln vs 112.9 mln Avg shrs 5,864,000 vs 6,030,000 Year Shr 45 cts vs 1.40 dlrs Net 2,664,000 vs 8,536,000 Revs 322.9 mln vs 312.3 mln Avg shrs 5,885,000 vs 6,105,000
Note: Net includes LIFO gains of 48,000 dlrs vs 118,000 dlrs for qtr and charges of 257,000 dlrs vs 225,000 dlrs for year. Reuter
